email_subject: Recap of the Recent KGC23 and Invitation to SIGAPP
email_body:
Dear Jane Tailor,

I hope this email finds you well. It was lovely to see you at the recent KGC23 event. It certainly was a meeting of minds and a great opportunity to meet talented individuals like you who are dedicated to keeping our systems secure.

In line with our ongoing activities and following the success of KGC23, I wanted to personally invite you to another event that I believe will be of great interest to you - the upcoming SIGAPP. This event is one of the best avenues to advance your knowledge and connect with other professionals in the field.

If you would like to attend, we have organized a special registration for our team members. Please confirm your attendance by clicking the link.

Feel free to reach out if you have any questions or concerns. Looking forward to seeing you there!

Best,
